text: José Pedro Balmaceda Pascal (born April 2, 1975), known professionally as Pedro Pascal, is a Chilean-American actor. He is best known for playing the roles of Oberyn Martell in the HBO series Game of Thrones, Javier Peña in the Netflix series Narcos, Din Djarin in The Mandalorian, and Joel Miller in The Last of Us. In March 2018, Pascal was cast in the DC Extended Universe movie Wonder Woman 1984 (2020) as Maxwell Lord. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Chilean movie actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from San Antonio, Texas Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors from Santiago
title: Pedro Pascal
